titles.title: A bill to improve the prohibitions on money laundering, and for other purposes.
Combating Money Laundering, Terrorist Financing, and Counterfeiting Act of 2019
Combating Money Laundering, Terrorist Financing, and Counterfeiting Act of 2019
Combating Money Laundering, Terrorist Financing, and Counterfeiting Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
